ygData.subject: terminating a crawl not terminating completely?
ygData.msgSnippet: When terminating a crawl in progress I ve noticed that the memory used value does not go back down after terminating.  It actually appears to keep increasing,

Subject: terminating a crawl not terminating completely?

When terminating a crawl in progress I've noticed that the memory used
value does not go back down after terminating.  It actually appears to
keep increasing, and the crawler running line still says "yes" despite
no current job showing



Status of crawler as of Aug. 10, 2004 22:14:03 GMT
